name: Renegades (Salt_Mate)
description:
This game was developed as a part of the "One Game A Week" Project Seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Science in Hamburg, short UE Hamburg. 

The topic of the Week was: "Destroy"

Description:

This is a short Textbased Adventure, that was inspired by my project Seminar and the Song "Renegades" by One Ok Rock.

Credits:

• Danarcade_exe

Background Music: CottageCore by Lindseysewel https://freesound.org/people/lindseysewell/sounds/512929/

Endscreen Music: Renegades by One Ok Rock. (PS: I don't own any rights to this song!) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4n5bpeh5NNg
